sig_info: Sabretooth gains a Passive Regeneration stack that recovers 20.16 to 59.96% of the damage taken from the hit over 30 seconds and is interrupted if Sabretooth is Heal Blocked.
Fury and Regeneration effects receive a permanent +60.4 to 100% flat Ability Accuracy.
If Sabretooth does not hit or get struck by the opponent for more than 5 seconds, he starts losing Regeneration stacks over time.

PASSIVE: Sabretooth can withstand incredibly cold temperatures, providing him Immunity to Cold Damage like Coldsnap and Frost bite.
Dodging back and allowing Sabretooth to idle for 1 second allows him to convert a temporary Fury Buff into a permanent passive effect.
Sabretooth can convert a maximum of 5 permanent Fury passives in a fight. Fury effects from previous fights do not count towards this limitation.
Sabretooth cannot convert his passive Fury effects while fighting if he has 15 or more permanent passive Fury effects active.
PERSISTENT CHARGE: At the start of the fight, if Sabretooth has 0 Persistent Charges, he will randomly receive between 3 and 6 Persistent Charges.

At the start of the fight, if Sabretooth has a Persistent Charge, he consumes one, re-activating up to 30 of his Fury effects that were active at the end of his last fight as permanent Passive Fury effects.
ALL ATTACKS: Every 10 hits on Sabretooth’s or 5 hits on the opponent’s Combo Meters, Sabretooth gains a Fury. Against Skill Champions, Sabretooth also inflicts an Armor Break if he is attacking, reducing the opponents Armor Rating by 400 for 10 seconds.
Fury increases Attack Rating by 18.75 for 5 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: 60% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 60 Direct Damage over 8 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Converts his temporary Fury Buffs into a permanent Passive Fury effect.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Activates a Fury effect and immediately converts it to a Passive effect, increasing Attack Rating by 11.25 permanently.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gains a Fury Buff, increasing Attack Rating by 33.75 for 2 seconds.

Fury increases Attack Rating by 24.75 for 5 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: 60% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 79.2 Direct Damage over 8 seconds.

SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Activates a Fury effect and immediately converts it to a Passive effect, increasing Attack Rating by 14.85 permanently.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gains a Fury Buff, increasing Attack Rating by 44.55 for 2 seconds.

At the start of the fight, if Sabretooth has a Persistent Charge, he consumes one, re-activating up to 30 of his Fury effects that were active at the end of his last fight as permanent Passive Fury effects.
ALL ATTACKS: Every 10 hits on Sabretooth’s or 5 hits on the opponent’s Combo Meters, Sabretooth gains a Fury. Against Skill Champions, Sabretooth also inflicts an Armor Break if he is attacking, reducing the opponents Armor Rating by 512.5 for 10 seconds.
Fury increases Attack Rating by 388.5 for 5 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: 60% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 1243.2 Direct Damage over 8 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Converts his temporary Fury Buffs into a permanent Passive Fury effect.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Activates a Fury effect and immediately converts it to a Passive effect, increasing Attack Rating by 233.1 permanently.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gains a Fury Buff, increasing Attack Rating by 699.3 for 2 seconds.

sig_info: If Sabretooth does not hit or get struck by the opponent for more than 5 seconds, he starts losing Regeneration stacks over time.
Sabretooth gains a Passive Regeneration stack that recovers 25.08 to 69.95% of the damage taken from the hit over 25 seconds and is interrupted if Sabretooth is Heal Blocked.
Fury and Regeneration effects receive a permanent +70.25 to 120% flat Ability Accuracy.
